Question & Options:

Options:

B. B) Majnu Pandey

Which characters are involved in the emotional blackmail regarding Ranjana's marriage?
Options:

D. D) Shankar Shetty
Correct Answer: A) Uday Shetty, D) Shankar Shetty

Question & Options:
What roles do Uday Shetty and Majnu Pandey play in the arrangement of Ranjana's marriage?
Options:
A. A) Uday Shetty is emotionally blackmailed into arranging Ranjana's marriage.
B. B) Majnu Pandey is also emotionally blackmailed into arranging Ranjana's marriage.
C. C) Uday Shetty and Majnu Pandey decide to arrange Ranjana's marriage to a decent man.
D. D) Uday Shetty and Majnu Pandey are trying to sidestep Ajju and Wanted Bhai's son.
Correct Answer: A) Uday Shetty is emotionally blackmailed into arranging Ranjana's marriage., B) Majnu Pandey is also emotionally blackmailed into arranging Ranjana's marriage., C) Uday Shetty and Majnu Pandey decide to arrange Ranjana's marriage to a decent man.

Question & Options:
What roles do the characters Uday, Majnu, Ranjana, and Shankar Shetty play in the context of the movie 'Welcome Back'?
Options:
A. A) Uday and Majnu are brothers involved with Wanted Bhai.
B. B) Ranjana is being arranged to marry a goon.
C. C) Shankar Shetty is related to Ranjana through his third marriage.
D. D) Uday and Majnu are peaceful characters throughout the movie.
Correct Answer: A) Uday and Majnu are brothers involved with Wanted Bhai., B) Ranjana is being arranged to marry a goon., C) Shankar Shetty is related to Ranjana through his third marriage.

Question & Options:
What actions do Uday and Majnu take regarding Ranjana's marriage in the movie 'Welcome Back'?
Options:
A. A) They attempt to arrange Ranjana's marriage with a goon.
B. B) They decide to arrange Ranjana's marriage to a decent man.
C. C) They visit Wanted Bhai to seek help regarding Ajju.
D. D) They try to keep Ajju away from Ranjana.
Correct Answer: B) They decide to arrange Ranjana's marriage to a decent man., C) They visit Wanted Bhai to seek help regarding Ajju., D) They try to keep Ajju away from Ranjana.

Question & Options:
What roles do Uday, Majnu, Ranjana, and Shankar Shetty play in the context of the movie 'Welcome Back'?
Options:
A. A) Uday and Majnu are brothers involved in violent activities.
B. B) Ranjana is the sister of Shankar Shetty.
C. C) Ajju is an antagonist that Uday and Majnu confront.
D. D) Shankar Shetty has a complicated family background involving multiple marriages.
Correct Answer: A) Uday and Majnu are brothers involved in violent activities., B) Ranjana is the sister of Shankar Shetty., C) Ajju is an antagonist that Uday and Majnu confront., D) Shankar Shetty has a complicated family background involving multiple marriages.

Question & Options:
What actions do Uday and Majnu take in relation to Ranjana and Ajju in the movie 'Welcome Back'?
Options:
A. A) Uday and Majnu plan to marry Ranjana to a decent man to avoid Ajju.
B. B) Uday and Majnu confront Ajju directly in a fight.
C. C) Uday and Majnu seek the help of Wanted Bhai to deal with Ajju.
D. D) Uday and Majnu return to their violent ways to deal with Ajju.
Correct Answer: A) Uday and Majnu plan to marry Ranjana to a decent man to avoid Ajju., D) Uday and Majnu return to their violent ways to deal with Ajju.
